page.title: 19KNOWE
page.content:
Mr.I.Dearness has been living at the {Knowe}for most of his married life.Ian and his son John and son_in_law David manage this{238-acre farm.
Ian has five tractors:_ {Massey Ferguson 35 {Ford 5,000 {Ford 5,600 {John Deere 1,640 {Massey Ferguson 690
He has{360 cattle}and{2 bulls.}He got {112 calves}this year. This year Ian got{70 lambs}and has{50 sheep.
He has a Renault van and also has an Avenger car. His son John also has a Ford Cortina car. They have{2 dogs, Lassie and Carlo. Carlo helps Ian with his sheep.
